answers.answer: The incidence in type 2 diabetes in hepatitis C patients is quite a bit higher than in the general population. It is known that late stage hep C is a risk factor for diabetes.

question: A poster on the Diabetes T2 forum said, "There is a lot of research that supports Hepatitis C leads to Type II diabetes." True or not true? Your thoughts please as this has me confused.
title: HCV and Diabetes
